description:
This reusable, non-toxic heat pack is safe even for kids and pets. Depending on the pack's exposure, activation, and use, it will provide heat for approximately 45 minutes to 2 hours.

  • Maximum temperature is 54°C
  • Contains water, a stainless steel disc, and food-grade ingredients
  • Activate by snapping the stainless steel disc and then, as it changes color, knead it to maximize heat and make it last
  • To reuse, simply boil the pack for approximately 5 minutes. (Microwaving not recommended)
  • Be sure not to let your Reusable Heater Pack freeze. Sub-zero temperatures will permanently affect the internal components, meaning no more toasty heat
name: Toasterz Reusable Heat Pack
